SELECT REVIEW_NO, TITLE, MEMBER_ID, CONTENT, REGDATE, GOODS_NO FROM REVIEW WHERE
(TITLE LIKE '%' || #{SearchKeyword} || '%')
(MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{SearchKeyword} || '%')
(CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{SearchKeyword} || '%')
ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC

select GOODS_NO, NAME, PRICE, WM_CONCAT(SAV_NAME) AS IMAGE from (select A.GOODS_NO, A.NAME, A.PRICE, B.SAV_NAME from GOODS A INNER JOIN UPLOAD B ON A.GOODS_NO = B.GOODS_NO
ORDER BY A.GOODS_NO DESC ) GROUP BY GOODS_NO, NAME, PRICE

select GOODS_NO, NAME, PRICE, WM_CONCAT(SAV_NAME) AS IMAGE from (select A.GOODS_NO, A.NAME, A.PRICE, B.SAV_NAME from GOODS A INNER JOIN UPLOAD B ON A.GOODS_NO = B.GOODS_NO

(NAME LIKE '%' || #{SearchKeyword} || '%')
